com.google.crypto.tink.integration.gcpkms

Class GcpKmsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.crypto.tink.integration.gcpkms.GcpKmsClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KmsClient

    @AutoService(value=KmsClient.class)
public final class GcpKmsClient
extends Object
implements KmsClient
    An implementation of KmsClient for Google Cloud KMS.
    Since:
    1.0.0

      • register

        public static void register(Optional<String> keyUri,
                            Optional<String> credentialPath)
                     throws GeneralSecurityException
        Creates and registers a GcpKmsClient(java.lang.String) with the Tink runtime.

        If keyUri is present, it is the only key that the new client will support. Otherwise the new client supports all GCP KMS keys.

        If credentialPath is present, load the credentials from that. Otherwise use the default credentials.

        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException
